snippet.title: Lucid Soul -- The Official Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.lucidsoulgame.com/

The OFFICIAL Trailer for Lucid Soul! Featuring Mark McAllister as the voice of Enasni, Haylizbeth / Hayley Nelson as the voice of Erzbet, and Nate Combs' score. The amazing visuals provided by SpectroliteAAA, who's animations have been bringing Black and his band of Deathtouched to life in ways we could only dream. 

The Trailer showcases all the playable PC's, in order of appearance, Erzbet, Synella, Lucretia, The Stitched Twins, Wick, Creep, and lastly the main character, Black. And now... for a taste of things to come!

https://www.lucidsoulgame.com/
